name: Lost Souls (Yuri Inhamuns, Reddino, Game Composer, GabrielBSL-UEA, SuzianeCundiff)
name_original: Lost Souls (Yuri Inhamuns, Reddino, Game Composer, GabrielBSL-UEA, SuzianeCundiff)
description:
Global Game Jam

A game made in 5 days for the Global Game Jam Manaus 2021  https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-souls-8

Sinopse:

You are a little ghost in the quest to help some poor souls to remember their past. With beautiful music and scenarios, this little ghost will pass thought tough platform challenges to recover the necessary items to help them to remember their past and, finally, have a good "Rest in Peace".

Credits: 

Gabriel Barroso - Programmer, Game Design
César Lima - Composer
Yuri Inhamuns - Designer UI, 2D Artist
Erick Cundiff - 2D Artist
Suziane Cundiff - Programmer
